mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (qno, id, qtitle, qcontent, qdate, qstatus, qtype) VALUES ( 'Q' || LPAD(seq_qna.NEXTVAL, 3, '0'), #{id}, #{qtitle}, #{qcontent}, #{qdate}, #{qstatus}, #{qtype} )
mapper.select: SELECT qno, id, qtitle, qcontent, qanswer, qdate, qstatus, qtype FROM QNA WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY qdate DESC
SELECT qno, id, qtitle, qcontent,qanswer, qdate, qstatus, qtype FROM QNA WHERE qno = #{qno}
SELECT fno, ftitle, fcontent FROM FAQ
SELECT qno, id, qtitle, qcontent,qanswer, qdate, qstatus, qtype FROM QNA WHERE qstatus = '대기'

SELECT qtitle AS title, qcontent AS content, 'QNA' AS source FROM qna WHERE qtitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR qcontent LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
UNION
SELECT ftitle AS title, fcontent AS content, 'FAQ' AS source FROM faq WHERE ftitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR fcontent LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
UNION
SELECT ntitle AS title, ncontent AS content, 'NOTICE' AS source FROM notice WHERE ntitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR ncontent LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO search_log(sid, keyword, today) VALUES('S' || LPAD(seq_search_log.NEXTVAL, 3, '0'),#{keyword},#{today, jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT keyword, COUNT(*) AS count FROM search_log WHERE TRUNC(today) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY keyword ORDER BY count DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=5
